Name: Back Wind
Description: This strong wind is destabilizing you, reducing your move speed by {OtherValues[0]}% during {Duration} seconds.

Name: Default Status
Description: A Default Status to Apply.

Name: Harpooned Stun Status
Description: HarpoonedStunStatus.

Name: Harpooned Debuff Status
Description: HarpoonedDebuffStatus.

Name: Touch
Description: Status applied on an enemy monster when he's touch with DeflagrationSpell.

Name: Voltage
Description: Status for stacks.

Name: Wait For The Boom
Description:
Countdown for the explosion of the pet 
The player cannot change form with this status applied on him
The Pet EXPLOSE dealing {Damages[0]} to all living things in the area ({OtherValues[0]}) of the explosion and kick them out from the Pet
Force the summoner back to his NeutralForm

Name: Countdown Before TheBoom
Description: the pet is waiting for his explosion, and the summoner can't change his form

Name: DefenseBoost
Description:
Status applied on the player and the pet that boost their defense.
His status is applied when the player in near the pet and if there are enemy monster with <<TouchStatus>>.
The defense boost value increase with the number of enemy monster 'touched' ({OtherValues[0]}*nb_enemy_touched)

Name: Regeneration
Description: Status applied on the player and the pet , increase the life point of the player(({OtherValues[0]} ans the regeneration of the pet({OtherValues[1]}
His status is applied when the player in near the pet

Name: DecreaseDamage
Description: Status applied on the player, decrease the damages dealt on the player{OtherValues[0]}

Name: Slow
Description: Status applied on the enemy monster hit by the AutoAttackSummonerSupport.
His status decrease the moving speed of the monster hit and slow it down by {OtherValues[0]}

Name: Favor of Fire
Description: Your next Conflagration has {OtherValues[0]}% chance to propagate Ignites on targets caught in the explosion.
The Favor of Fire lasts for {Duration} seconds or until the next use of <<Conflagration>>.

Name: Gust
Description: You are proud to fight for the god of Storms.
Reduces your cooldown by {OtherValues[0]}% during {Duration} sec.

Name: Ignite
Description: Burn that inflicts {Damages[0]} every {TicksIntervals[0]} second during {Duration} seconds.

Name: Inside Storm
Description: The wind in your back makes you move faster.
Increases your move speed by {OtherValues[0]}% during {Duration} seconds.

Name: Wind Push
Description: Bumps the enemy in the air for {Duration} sec.
When the enemy is bumped, it can not move or attack.

Name: Wind Spirit Favor
Description: You have the spirit of the storm, all your cooldown are reduced by {OtherValues[0]}% during {Duration} seconds.
